Package mongochat

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatDate
    A very simple wrapper class for DateTime, that provides input and output of chat dates via a unified date pattern: "MMM dd, yyyy HH:mm:ss aaa".
    ChatObserverThread
    A Thread that uses the MongoClient of a Client to observe changes in the MessageCollection and direct all new Messages to the Clients output stream.
    Client
    A chat client, that corresponds to a single user in the MongoChat system.
    Main  
    Message
    Represents a chat message, that is convenient to use with mongoDB collections.
